title: Brands No Longer See Metaverse-Like Worlds as Abstract Gimmicks
sub_head: Chipotle, Vans and Verizon turn to Roblox, Fortnite in an effort to build brand recognition
body:
Brands had been toying with the metaverse for some time before Facebookâ€™s recent name change turned the term into a household word. Now some of them are getting serious.
Companies including Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc., Verizon Communications Inc. and streetwear brand Vans earlier this year built their own digital worlds on metaverse-like platforms such as Roblox Corp. and Fortnite Creative in an attempt to improve brand recognition and get existing customers more engaged.
